mapper.insert: INSERT into user (loginName, loginPwd, userName, userCode,userEmail) values (#{loginName},#{loginPwd},#{userName},#{userCode},#{userEmail})
mapper.update: update user set loginPwd =#{loginPwd} where userCode=#{userCode}
mapper.select: update user set token= #{token} where loginName=#{loginName}
select from user userEmail where loginName=#{loginName}
select token from user where loginName=#{loginName}
